!Astrologer Creta: I can see that you are still in a hurry. I have told you all that I have seen. There were many shadows, this means many culprits. I definitely recognize the shadow of a human. There are differences between shadows, but I see no more shadows of monsters. Take this letter explaining the situation back to the *owner of the key*. There will come a day when we will meet again. I hope our next meeting is of a more pleasant nature. Until then.
